item.title: Kale pesto
item.description: Ingredients 1 big bunch of kale, rinsed, ribs removed and torn into large pieces 3⁄4 cup EVOO, 2 tablespoons of which was Meyer lemon olive oil 1⁄2 cup Parmigiano, microplaned 2 cloves garlic, smashed and rough chopped 1⁄2 cup pine nuts Salt and pepper to taste 1 tablespoon lemon juice, fresh Directions Blanch the kale in boiling salted water for about 3 minutes and chill down in a cold water bath, drain and squeeze excess water.
